default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: I've been waiting for you all this time.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: As long as you need me, I'll always stay by your side.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: Everything that's mine will also be yours. This is the purpose of Hecate.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Stay behind me.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Now, what's next?

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: I'm fine, I don't feel any pain.

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: You... mustn't be too close to the Chief!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: It's okay... There will still be another me.

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Did you sleep well last night, Chief? Today's order, please.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: ...All is well as long as you're safe, no?

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: How are Sinners different from Corruptors? After all, we all live, bleed, and die. What makes you think we're any different?

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: If I'm gone, there will still be another Hecate. You shouldn't worry.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: You can be stricter with me. Those who are kind to me... always end up...

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Ever since meeting you, I've always felt like I'm no longer Hecate. I don't know what I'll become. When that day comes... will you guide me?

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: If one day... I no longer exist as Hecate, will you still keep me by your side, Chief?

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: I don't need any more orders, Chief. Whatever journey awaits us ahead, I'll follow my heart and walk with you till the end.

default.title: Idle
default.text: Sweet dreams.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: If it embarrasses you to say the order out loud, don't hesitate to just use me.

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: You don't have to do this. I'll always stay by your side.

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Is this an order? Okay, I'll see to it.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: It's done. I'm home.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: If this is what you wish for, I'll do it.

default.title: Join Team
default.text: I'm here.

yesterday_revisits.title: Obtain Attire
yesterday_revisits.text: Well, if you didn't request it... I wouldn't have had the chance to wear this outfit.

yesterday_revisits.title: Greeting
yesterday_revisits.text: What do I need to do today?

yesterday_revisits.title: Ordinary Contact 1
yesterday_revisits.text: People always take pictures of me when I wear this outfit, but it's been a long time since anyone has asked me to put it on.

yesterday_revisits.title: Ordinary Contact 2
yesterday_revisits.text: If there's a chance... would you please take me somewhere outside the battlefield?

yesterday_revisits.title: Ordinary Contact 3
yesterday_revisits.text: I used to listen to bedtime stories on the phone. But one day, I forgot what the story was about, then the phone never rang again.

yesterday_revisits.title: Ordinary Contact 4
yesterday_revisits.text: Adjutant Nightingale said my sketchbook was very dangerous and shouldn't be seen by anyone, so I hid it in this box.

yesterday_revisits.title: Idle
yesterday_revisits.text: I have painted some paintings related to you, Chief. They all said I must not let you see them.

yesterday_revisits.title: Special Attention
yesterday_revisits.text: If you like this style... Do you want to make it the Bureau's uniform?

yesterday_revisits.title: Level Up
yesterday_revisits.text: I don't slack off even during breaks.

yesterday_revisits.title: Pat Head
yesterday_revisits.text: My hat? They say only painters would wear it. By the way... what's a painter?

travellers_tale.title: Obtain Attire
travellers_tale.text: Hi, I'm an otherworld mage with the power to manipulate dreams and fantasies... These are my lines, right?

travellers_tale.title: Greeting
travellers_tale.text: Are you going to join us too, Chief? All right, I will do my best to protect you, even if it's just a game.

travellers_tale.title: Ordinary Contact 1
travellers_tale.text: It's nice to do something other than following orders once in a while... I guess this is what relaxing means.

travellers_tale.title: Ordinary Contact 2
travellers_tale.text: In the virtual world, anyone can become the character of their dreams, and do things that they can't do in reality... I guess this is what makes games so alluring.

travellers_tale.title: Ordinary Contact 3
travellers_tale.text: Nightmare also put on the new gear, it seems to like it a lot.

travellers_tale.title: Ordinary Contact 4
travellers_tale.text: Mulangrador... Ah... EMP says that to really immerse yourself in the game, you should say the magic skill names out loud.

travellers_tale.title: Idle
travellers_tale.text: O brave warrior who have come here from afar, accept the guidance of the heavens and stars to embark on a quest for the secret treasure...

travellers_tale.title: Special Attention
travellers_tale.text: Where do you want to go for the mission, Chief? Just give me the order and I'll come with you.

travellers_tale.title: Pat Head
travellers_tale.text: Mess told me that this is the gear only a mage gets to have... The bigger the hat, the higher the bonus stats. Want one too, Chief?
